interface.name: X509Data
interface.comment: @@@ check for illegal combinations of data violating MUSTs in W3c spec
interface.javadoc: URI identifying the X509Data KeyInfo type: http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#X509Data. This can be specified as the value of the type parameter of the{@link RetrievalMethod} class to describe a remote X509Data structure.

URI identifying the binary (ASN.1 DER) X.509 Certificate KeyInfo type: http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#rawX509Certificate. This can be specified as the value of the type parameter of the{@link RetrievalMethod} class to describe a remote X509 Certificate.

Returns an {@link java.util.Collections#unmodifiableList unmodifiable list} of the content in this X509Data. Valid types are{@link String} (subject names), byte[] (subject key ids),{@link java.security.cert.X509Certificate}, {@link X509CRL}, or {@link XMLStructure} ({@link X509IssuerSerial}objects or elements from an external namespace). an unmodifiable list of the content in this X509Data (never null or empty)
